HomePage.title: Home Page
HomePage.about: I have experience in telecommunications and e-commerce, but I realized that I am more interested in writing code. In addition to coding, I enjoy photography, keeping up with new technologies, biking, and listening to electronic music. If you're looking for a reliable and enthusiastic Frontend/React developer to work with, let's team up and create something amazing!
HomePage.myProjectText: Check out some of my recent projects

ContactPage.title: Contact Page
ContactPage.paragraph1: Let's Work Together on Your next Frontend/React project!
ContactPage.paragraph2: If you're looking for a reliable and enthusiastic Frontend/React developer to work with, let's team up and create something amazing. I am committed to providing exceptional service and ensuring that your project is completed on time and within budget.
ContactPage.paragraph3: Please feel free to contact me with any questions or job opportunities you may have, and I will respond promptly. Let's take your project to the next level!
